dcterms:creator: R. Krajewski
J. Bock
L. Kloeker
L. Eckstein
dcterms:description: The HighD dataset is a German dataset that records naturalistic top-view scenes on German highway roads using a camera integrated into a quadcopter. It includes 60 tracks containing more than 110,500 vehicles, providing detailed information such as vehicle position, speed, acceleration, and time to collision (TTC) with surrounding vehicles.
dcterms:title: HighD Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Woo

T. Sugano
Y. Yamamoto
A. Yamashita
H. Asama
dcterms:description: The NGSIM dataset is used for lane-change detection based on vehicle trajectory prediction. It provides data on vehicle positions, speeds, and other relevant metrics necessary for analyzing lane-changing behavior.
dcterms:title: NGSIM Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Izquierdo
A. Quintanar
I. Parra
D. Fern√°ndez-Llorca
M. A. Sotelo
dcterms:description: The PREVENTION dataset is utilized for predicting lane-change intentions using methodologies based on CNN and LSTM. It contains visual information and vehicle trajectories necessary for training models to predict lane changes.
dcterms:title: PREVENTION Dataset
